Package it.polimi.ingsw.ps60.serverSide.controller.turn

Class DivinityStrategy

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.ps60.serverSide.controller.turn.DivinityStrategy
public class DivinityStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
This class create an easy access to all the controller based on which divinity card the player has
